channel.title: activities on gizem arici
channel.description: Recent content in activities on gizem arici

item.title: event 1
item.description: title: my inner child wants to have tattoos + eat cake what: group exhibition and tattoo event where: springbrættet6a, 2200 copenhagen date: sunday, 07 august 2022 time: 13.00-18:00h CET artists: anna dea (@feverinthebrain), maria (@gin__berry) + myself (@gizisvisible) tattoo artist: ana (@polvo_eres) sound: nathalie (@lunathalie) production: maria (@gin__berry) + myself (@gizisvisible)

item.title: event 2
item.description: title: watery words what: poetry readings alongside open bathhouse facilities with the option to take a bath + enjoy the sauna where: sjællandsgadebad, 2200 copenhagen date: thursday, 01 december 2022 time: 19.30-22.00h CET poets: ava (@avaunnur), maria (@gin__berry) + myself (@gizisvisible) production: myself (@gizisvisible) capacity: 47 people, sold out

item.title: event 3
item.description: title: soundscape and essay reading in the bathhouse what: essay reading followed by sounscape where: sjællandsgadebad, 2200 copenhagen date: thursday, 16 february 2023 time: 19.30-21.30h CET essay: myself (@gizisvisible) soundscape: rosangela (@ro_atelier) capacity: 47 people, sold out
